title: Right task bar won't appear
body: I can't accept anything because of it

replies.body:
Same here lol
Imagine messing up the most basic of things, I mean this is literally the opening screen.
Same thing here. I tried to troubleshoot it and it still wont work
Same thing is happening to my 2 friends and me. Riot Client is a joke tbh.{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

Same thing is happening to me and another friend. Riot said they we're aware of a bug that disconnects people from chat?? If that's the same thing? I don't know. You can still invite people to games. You gotta do it the hard way though.

This client is worthless.
can this be moved to report a bug for the normal game i don't know why it's posted in TFT
